substeps.description: Medical doctor reviews patient's medical history
substeps.reasoning: Directly contributes to understanding patient's condition and informing diagnosis

substeps.description: Doctor and nurse perform physical examination
substeps.reasoning: Essential for assessing current health status and identifying issues

substeps.description: Doctor and nurse discuss initial assessment findings
substeps.reasoning: Collaborative analysis enhances diagnosis accuracy and treatment planning

substeps.description: Technician collects required samples from patient

substeps.reasoning: Provides crucial diagnostic information for patient care

substeps.description: Technician documents and reports test results

Critical for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning

substeps.description: Doctor and nurse discuss treatment options
substeps.reasoning: Collaborative decision-making enhances quality of care

substeps.description: Doctor and nurse administer agreed-upon treatment

substeps.description: Doctor and nurse monitor patient's response to treatment

substeps.description: Doctor checks for potential drug interactions or allergies
